Name: Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It's Dark Outside
About the game: Sam is an ordinary kid who, with the help of his red cape, turns into 'superhero' Pajama Sam. In No Need to Hide When It’s Dark Outside, Pajama Sam journeys into the land of darkness (his closet) to face his fears. Help Pajama Sam figure out who or what is behind the darkness and realize that there is no need to hide when it’s dark outside! Game Features: Think, listen, explore--fun learning encourages critical thinking, fosters listening and memory skills, and reinforces good social skills. Cartoon-quality learning adventure where you choose where the characters go. Explore exciting locations and collect information to complete the adventure. The adventure changes each time you play! This product uses ScummVM across Windows, Mac and Linux which is released under the GNU GPL v2. For more information, please visit - The GNU GPL can be viewed here - -2.0.html
